column4: any good resources for configuring a web server and SSH on ubuntu server?
i have it all installed but i dont know how to configure
i just want a nice guide on how to do things
ive used IIS but never apache
and i have never run SSH or mysql
well anyone can use google, i was asking if you know of any good sources that you have used
any of the articles you can find on google are going to work with you
there is not like a magic article or manual for that
no didnt think so, but i was wondering if there was a decent comprehensive one
hello guys i have an issue with my webcam anyone who can help me here? http://rafb.net/p/bxGmxl74.html
with server the only interface is through terminal correct? no gui?
it depends on what you want to do
ssh yeah is a terminal wiith no gui
what do you mean?
hello guys i have an issue with my webcam anyone who can help me here? http://rafb.net/p/bxGmxl74.html

if you want to connect to your server and use it as if you were inside of the computer u can use ssh and its going to be a console no gui.... also u can use vnc to connect to your server (it will give you gui)
